title: Player Requests Skill Rating Reset
description: A long-absent player returns to a competitive game and requests their skill rating (MMR) be reset because they are out of practice.

tasks.description: Identify the player's account and check their recent match history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the player has not played any matches in over a year.

tasks.description: Check the policy for MMR resets and confirm the player is eligible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the policy allows a reset after 6 months of inactivity.

tasks.description: Reset the player's MMR to the default starting value.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully resets the player's skill rating.
